title: Professor Zhengxing Wu Visits MAgIC Lab.
description: Professor Zhengxing Wu, a researcher of the Institute of Automation of the Chinese Academy of Sciences, recently participated in the ASSIST2024 hosted by ShanghaiTech University, and delivered a speech on the title of 'Intelligent Bio-inspired Underwater Autonomous Vehicle Systems'. After that, he visited the MagIC Lab and had interesting discussions with the students here.
